New Records: Anthony Edwards scored a career-high 37 points, including 28 in the second half and made two critical 3-pointers late in the game.
Key Match Events: Edwards led a 10-0 run in the second quarter, turning the deficit around and ultimately securing the win with two key 3-pointers in the fourth quarter.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at the same arena as an earlier NBA Cup group-play game between the two teams.
Others: The Clippers were leading by 19 points in the first half but couldn't hold on due to Edwards' late-game performance.
